CustomField.formula: IF(CloseDate > DATE(2018,2,1), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2019,2,2), TEXT(2019), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2020,2,1), TEXT(2020), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2021,1,30), TEXT(2021), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2022,1,29), TEXT(2022), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2023,1,28), TEXT(2023), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2024,2,3), TEXT(2024), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2025,2,1), TEXT(2025), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2026,1,31), TEXT(2026), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2027,1,30), TEXT(2027), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2028,1,29), TEXT(2028), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2029,1,27), TEXT(2029), IF( CloseDate <= DATE(2030,2,2), TEXT(2030),TEXT(YEAR(CloseDate)))))))))))))), IF(CloseDate >= DATE(2017,2,1), TEXT(2018), IF(CloseDate >= DATE(2016,2,1), TEXT(2017), IF(CloseDate >= DATE(2015,2,1), TEXT(2016),TEXT(YEAR(CloseDate))))))
CustomField.label: Fiscal Year
